that's a very large question, I'd suggest Googling for specific tutorials
all i want is to set an address to my server and connect to it persay in the librery
if you have a domain name hosted by someone, simply add an A record to the DNS settings provided by them pointing to your IP address
however if you have a dynamic ip you will have to sign up for a service like DynDNS, otherwise you'll have to keep writing down your ip everytime the connection refreshes
